title: Swordsmen in the Sky - Donald A. Wollheim (ed) 1964
description:
Swordsmen in the Sky - Donald A. Wollheim (ed) 1964
First ePUB Edition 2012
Amontoth

Another one of the releases I was working on in 2012 when Demonoid went down.
.
I OCRed and converted Gorgon776_'s pulpscan of the paperback to ePUB.



In the flood of ERB, planatary romances and Sword and Sorcery reprints in the 60's, Ace Books and the iconic editor Donald A. Wollheim (ed)
 brought out this slim volume or some of the shorter fictiosn that would have be otherwise overlooked.


TABLE OF CONTENTS
Swordsmen of Lost Terra (1951) by Poul Anderson
The People of the Crater (1947) by Andre Norton
The Moon That Vanished (1948) by Leigh Brackett
A Vision of Venus (1933) by Otis Adelbert Kline
Kaldar, World of Antares (1933) by Edmond Hamilton. 

-Amontoth
